.. js:module:: App

App Component
=============

The main component that defines the routes for the application.

Example usage:
--------------

.. code-block:: jsx

   <App />

Returns
-------

:literal:`JSX.Element` - Rendered App component.


Routes
------

- ``/``: Renders the :literal:`SignInSide` component.
- ``/login``: Renders the :literal:`SignInSide` component.
- ``/signup``: Renders the :literal:`SignUpSide` component.
- ``/dashboard``: Renders the :literal:`Dashboard` component.
- ``/results``: Renders the :literal:`TrainingResultsPage` component.
- ``/models``: Renders the :literal:`ModelsOverviewPage` component.
